quests.name: Visit cherry blossom tree displays
quests.shortDescription: No spring vacation is complete without checking out our beautiful blossoms!

quests.name: Collect a Golden Egg
quests.shortDescription: When you collect this local treasure, it drops Bars!

quests.name: Hire a Specialist Character
quests.shortDescription: Every tour guide has a different skill set to make the most of your vacation.

quests.name: Collect an egg within 5 seconds after being laid by a chicken
quests.description: Collect an egg within 5 seconds after being laid by a chicken
quests.shortDescription: See local wonders, like a live egg laying!

quests.name: Deal damage to players with a Specialist Character hired

quests.shortDescription: Your Specialist tour guides can be really helpful in a jam!

quests.name: Swim in the hot springs at Steamy Springs
quests.description: Swim in the hot springs at Steamy Springs
quests.shortDescription: What spring vacation is complete without a relaxing soak?

quests.name: Deal damage to players while under the effects of a Hop Egg
quests.description: Deal damage to players while under the effects of a Hop Egg

quests.name: Eliminate opponents with sniper rifles
